definition: to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Water Proof Switch, Used for electric kettle, Washing machine.
sentences.chinese: 防水开关，用于电水壶，洗衣机。

sentences.english: Wear an outer layer of breathable, wind-resistant, water-resistant material.
sentences.chinese: 穿一件抗风防水材料制成的透气的外套。

sentences.english: All the cartons are lined with plastic sheets， so they're absolutely water-proof， I can assure you.
sentences.chinese: 所有纸箱都内衬塑料袋，我可以保证绝对防水。

sentences.english: Dry-treated - Ropes that have been coated with or immersed in a water-repellent chemical.
sentences.chinese: 外层涂抹或浸入一种防水化学物质的绳索。

sentences.english: The sloshing of my new waterproof boots was unnerving .
sentences.chinese: 在晃动我国新型防水靴是紧张。

sentences.english: The aerogel has good hydrophobic property after surface hydrophobic treatment with organo-silicone waterproofing agent.
sentences.chinese: 经有机硅防水剂表面处理后产品具有良好的疏水性能。

sentences.english: A complex water-repellent gypsum additive was studied in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 采用特殊工艺制备了复合型石膏防水剂。

sentences.english: Waterproof jacket that transforms into a one person sleeping bag.
sentences.chinese: 这是一件防水夹克，可以变身为单人睡袋哦。

sentences.english: Actuator design with fully sealed waterproof high degree of protection.
sentences.chinese: 执行机构采用全密封防水设计防护等级高。

sentences.english: Shoes and boots go right onto the waterproof mat laid out next to the wall, , and coats go on the coat rack behind the door.
sentences.chinese: 鞋靴摆放在靠墙的防水垫上，外套挂在门后。

sentences.english: New type of emulsion waterproof coating .

sentences.chinese: 手工制作的防水硫化橡胶壳。

sentences.english: Paint twice or thrice to obtain permanent effect;
sentences.chinese: 如果要获得持久防水效果，须涂两至三遍。

sentences.english: A light gabardine raincoat of the type made by Burberry's of London.
sentences.chinese: 一种由防水棉布做成的轻便雨衣。

sentences.english: Many laminated documents are waterproof, tear proof, and tamper proof.
sentences.chinese: 许多夹层文件防水，抗撕裂证明，和防篡改。

definition: drain/underground drainpipe/floor gutter/25th of 2nd lunar month
